attributes.action: Electoral reform so each political party gets fair representation for voting.
attributes.additional_details: Now even though I am not in anyway shape or form a UKIP supporter , the fact they 12.6% of the vote share in the 2015 general elections , but only have 2 MP's shows how our voting system is flawed.
attributes.background: The current voting system only supports the main 2 parties , even though I am a labour supporter this is not fair and should be changed to give a fair representation of the voting share. We are supposed to be living in a democratic society which doesn't appear to be all that democratic
